mapper.select: SELECT count(user) as pv, count(distinct user) as uv, count(DISTINCT ip) as uip FROM t_link_access_logs WHERE full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND del_flag = 0 AND create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY full_short_url

SELECT count(user) as pv, count(distinct user) as uv, count(DISTINCT ip) as uip FROM t_link_access_logs t1, t_link t2 WHERE gid = #{gid} AND t1.full_short_url = t2.full_short_url AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
SELECT ip, COUNT(ip) as cnt FROM t_link_access_logs WHERE full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND del_flag = 0 AND create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ip LIMIT 5

SELECT ip, COUNT(ip) as cnt FROM t_link_access_logs t1, t_link t2 WHERE gid = #{gid} AND t1.full_short_url = t2.full_short_url AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ip LIMIT 5

SELECT sum(oldUser) AS oldUserCount, SUM(newUser) AS newUserCount FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(create_time)) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS oldUser, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(create_time)) = 1 AND MAX(create_time) between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS newUser FROM t_link_access_logs WHERE full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND del_flag = 0 GROUP BY user ) AS user_count

SELECT sum(oldUser) AS oldUserCount, SUM(newUser) AS newUserCount FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.create_time)) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS oldUser, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(t1.create_time)) = 1 AND MAX(t1.create_time) between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS newUser FROM t_link_access_logs t1, t_link t2 WHERE gid = #{gid} AND t1.full_short_url = t2.full_short_url AND t1.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY user ) AS user_count

SELECT * FROM t_link t1, t_link_access_logs t2 WHERE t2.full_short_url = t1.full_short_url AND t1.gid = #{gid} AND t2.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND t2.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t2.create_time desc
